segments.text: Thank you . I wonder whether I can enjoy the life insurance and health insurance .

segments.text: Of course . A two-week paid vacation a year , a five-day workweek .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , all the insurance will be linked with your work . We will issue an insurance policy .
